oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Student Barracks in the Snow, 1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dormitories; Housing; Winter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Student housing barracks were covered with snow during the winter of 1950.
The barracks--military surplus post-war-- were erected in campus in 1946 and first occupied in February 1947. One unit housed thirty single veterans; the other provided housing for three married couples.
